items.content_html: An AngularFire extension for authentication with WebAuthn passkeys. Includes a single Firebase Function for all WebAuthn operations, three tree-shakeable async methods for use in components, and a strongly-typed error object.

items.content_html: The AWS Amplify CLI is a toolchain for simplifying serverless web and mobile development. This plugin provides functionality for the API category, allowing for the creation and management of GraphQL and REST based backends for your amplify project.
